response.original_title: 花ざかりの君たちへ ~イケメン♂パラダイス~卒業式&7と1/2話スペシャル
response.overview: A special set half a year after the series finale. As Osaka High School prepares for an upcoming Valentine's Day event, Sano and Nakatsu reflect on the final week of their summer vacation, which falls between episodes 7 and 8 in the original series' timeline. The special also includes a graduation scene and the direction Mizuki and Sano's relationship is taking.
response.title: 花ざかりの君たちへ ~イケメン♂パラダイス~卒業式&7と1/2話スペシャル
